description: This mango and avocado toast sprinkled with homemade dukkah hits the trifecta of being breakfast, brunch and snack worthy. Make it in just 15 minutes and enjoy!
name: Mango & Avocado Toast With Dukkah Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 mango, peeled, cut into small cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Place nuts, fennel seeds and cumin seeds in a small food processor and process until a coarse crumb forms. Heat a small frying pan over low heat. Add sesame seeds and nut mixture and toast, stirring, for 3 minutes or until fragrant. Transfer to a small bowl. Stir in salt and pepper.
Place avocado and lemon juice in a small bowl and mash coarsely with a fork.
Spread each piece of toast with avocado mixture. Top with mango and sprinkle with dukkah. Serve drizzled with a little oil.
